item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Doherty's East Ave. Irish Pub on East Ave. in Pawtucket! Hope Street turns into East Ave when crossing into Pawtucket, so its just over the border of the East Side).

Doherty's is a homey local pub located just over the Providence line in Pawtucket and a FAVORITE location of many P-Collective members - you know who you are! Is it possible we haven't had an MNM here since October 2011?! Known for their HUGE selection of beer on tap, and on a personal note, their steak tips and long island ice teas, there is something for everyone! Monday night is Wing Nite too, so be adventuresome, cross on over to Pawtucket, and let's check it out!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Night Meetup. Ever. Except Hurricane Sandy and NYE 2012!

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Robert is graciously hosting this one! Please take a look at his picture!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Doherty's East Ave Cafe!
